data.name: XAnimateColor
desc: Interface for animation by defining color changes over time.
Only color value will be legal values for the following members

properties.name: ColorInterpolation
desc: defines the color space which is used to perform the interpolation.

properties.name: Direction
desc: defines the direction which is used to perform the interpolation inside the color space defined with ColorInterpolation.
Values could be TRUE for clockwise and FALSE for counterclockwise.
This attribute will be ignored for color spaces where this does not make any sense.
